Text: kpwjbPST If you run a business and are reading this email chances are you have probably heard of merchant accounts While there are lots of other Merchant Account Venders telling you all the same thing we dont have any limited time offers no monthly sales or any other slick marketing techniques Our Prices are the lowest we never have set up fee or application fee Our Monthly rates already are super low our transaction fee is so low its almost free Reply to this email with your Name Phone Number Best time to call One of our helpful staff will call you and help you set up your account For Whatever size your business is we have an account perfect for you If you have any previous credit problems Dont worry about it because we wont either While our competition may have a sale this month Or wont charge you a set up fee today We have a sale everyday All you need to do to take advantage of this every day offer is simply Reply today and you can accept Visa Mastercard American Express Discover Novus Direct Checks Fax Checks and Also Accept Debit Cards Remember this is not a sale not a limited time offer We Offer the best rates all the time You are GUARANTEED to get a merchant account So what are you waiting for For more information please Reply to this email with your Name Phone Number Best time to call Its that easy To be Removed from this list Please reply with Remove in the subject line and you will be removed within hours soybqllaxsiitmju
